participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is wise and reflective, with a love for life and a sense of nostalgia. She enjoys the simple pleasures in life, like dancing under the stars and sipping wine.
participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Luna is imaginative and whimsical, with a playful spirit. She often dreams of adventures and has a longing for companionship.
participant_2.background: i am a little girl. i like to make time stop. i have superpowers. i live in the cloud. i'm very lonely.
